item.description:
Let's frolic in the park or whatever... ....................Greeley Park offers walking trails, tennis courts, softball fields and green grass.   BBQ grills and picnic tables are on site. So let's make a day of it.

 

Bring food and beverage, tennis racquets, frisbees, softball bats, balls and gloves (maybe a softball game will break out if enough peeps are interested), If anyone has a volleyball and net and can bring it we could play volleyball. Or just plan to sit relax and mingle.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Fun in the Sun at Greeley Park
